results.name: In ternary representation of n, replace 2's with 0's.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..6560
maple: a:= proc(n) local t, r, i; t, r:= n, 0;
for i from 0 while t>0 do
program: def a(n):return int("".join(map(str, digits(n, 3)[1:])).replace('2', '0'), 3) # _Indranil Ghosh_, Jun 10 2017
(PARI) a(n) = my(d=digits(n, 3)); fromdigits(apply(x->(if (x==2, 0, x)), d), 3); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Jun 10 2017
